dict.acceptation: 旅行者，观光客；〈美〉冬季到南部做工的流动工人；

sent.orig: Have built tourist cognition and tourist perception value, tourist behavior intentioncorrelation structural model.
sent.trans: 建立了旅游者认知和旅游者感知价值、旅游者行为意图的关联结构模型。

sent.orig: Nandaihe many attractions tourist area has become a leading tourist Funing County.
sent.trans: 南戴河旅游度假区内景点众多已成为抚宁县旅游的龙头。

sent.orig: Tourist festivals represented by the Beijing International Tourist Culture Festival shall be further improved.
sent.trans: 进一步完善以北京国际旅游文化节为代表的旅游节庆活动。

sent.orig: Community tourist service will provide a good condition the development of new tourist products.
sent.trans: 社区化旅游服务为新的旅游产品开发提供了良好条件。

sent.orig: Xishuangbanna in yunnan Airlines tourist hotels, tourist resort city of Jinghong Meng Long Road 6, four-star.
sent.trans: 云南航空西双版纳观光酒店，景洪市旅游度假区勐龙路6号，四星级。
